019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import com.google.gson.JsonArray;
022import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
023import com.google.gson.JsonPrimitive;
024import freemarker.core.ParseException;
025import freemarker.template.Configuration;
026import freemarker.template.DefaultObjectWrapperBuilder;
027import freemarker.template.MalformedTemplateNameException;
028import freemarker.template.TemplateException;
029import freemarker.template.TemplateExceptionHandler;
030import freemarker.template.TemplateHashModel;
031import freemarker.template.TemplateNotFoundException;
032import io.kubernetes.client.custom.V1Patch;
033import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
034import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesApi;
035import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesObject;
036import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.Dynamics;
037import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.ListOptions;
038import java.io.IOException;
039import java.io.StringWriter;
040import java.util.Collections;
041import java.util.HashMap;
042import java.util.Map;
043import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.APP_NAME;
044import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.VM_OP_GROUP;
045import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.VM_OP_NAME;
046import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.VM_OP_VERSION;
047import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.VmDefChanged.Type;
048import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.ExtendedObjectWrapper;
049import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
050import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
051import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
052
053/**
054 * Adapts Kubenetes resources to changes in VM definitions (CRs). 
055 */
056@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis",
057    "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
058public class Reconciler extends Component {
059
060    private static final String STATE_RUNNING = "Running";
061    private static final String STATE_STOPPED = "Stopped";
062    private final Configuration fmConfig;
063
064    /**
065     * Instantiates a new reconciler.
066     *
067     * @param componentChannel the component channel
068     */
069    public Reconciler(Channel componentChannel) {
070        super(componentChannel);
071
072        // Configure freemarker library
073        fmConfig = new Configuration(Configuration.VERSION_2_3_32);
074        fmConfig.setDefaultEncoding("utf-8");
075        fmConfig.setObjectWrapper(new ExtendedObjectWrapper(
076            fmConfig.getIncompatibleImprovements()));
077        fmConfig.setTemplateExceptionHandler(
078            TemplateExceptionHandler.RETHROW_HANDLER);
079        fmConfig.setLogTemplateExceptions(false);
080        fmConfig.setClassForTemplateLoading(Reconciler.class, "");
081    }
082
083    /**
084     * Handles the change event.
085     *
086     * @param event the event
087     * @param channel the channel
088     * @throws ApiException the api exception
089     * @throws IOException 
090     * @throws ParseException 
091     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException 
092     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException 
093     * @throws TemplateException 
094     * @throws KubectlException 
095     */
096    @Handler
097    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ConfusingTernary")
098    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, WatchChannel channel)
099            throws ApiException, TemplateException, IOException {
100        DynamicKubernetesApi vmDefApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi(VM_OP_GROUP,
101            VM_OP_VERSION, event.crd().getName(), channel.client());
102        var defMeta = event.metadata();
103
104        // Get common data for all reconciles
105        DynamicKubernetesObject vmDef = null;
106        Map<String, Object> model = null;
107        if (event.type() != Type.DELETED) {
108            vmDef = K8s.get(vmDefApi, defMeta).get();
109
110            // Prepare Freemarker model
111            model = new HashMap<>();
112            model.put("cr", vmDef.getRaw());
113            model.put("constants",
114                (TemplateHashModel) new DefaultObjectWrapperBuilder(
115                    Configuration.VERSION_2_3_32)
116                        .build().getStaticModels()
117                        .get(Constants.class.getName()));
118        }
119
120        // Reconcile
121        if (event.type() != Type.DELETED) {
122            reconcileDataPvc(model, channel);
123            reconcileDisks(vmDef, channel);
124            var configMap = reconcileConfigMap(event, model, channel);
125            model.put("cm", configMap.getRaw());
126            reconcilePod(event, model, channel);
127        } else {
128            reconcilePod(event, model, channel);
129            reconcileConfigMap(event, model, channel);
130            deletePvcs(event, channel);
131        }
132    }
133
134    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ConfusingTernary")
135    private void reconcileDataPvc(Map<String, Object> model,
136            WatchChannel channel)
137            throws TemplateException, ApiException, IOException {
138        // Combine template and data and parse result
139        var fmTemplate = fmConfig.getTemplate("runnerDataPvc.ftl.yaml");
140        StringWriter out = new StringWriter();
141        fmTemplate.process(model, out);
142        // Avoid Yaml.load due to
143        // https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/issues/2741
144        var pvcDef = Dynamics.newFromYaml(out.toString());
145
146        // Get API and check if PVC exists
147        DynamicKubernetesApi pvcApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi("", "v1",
148            "persistentvolumeclaims", channel.client());
149        var existing = K8s.get(pvcApi, pvcDef.getMetadata());
150
151        // If PVC does not exist, create. Else patch (apply)
152        if (existing.isEmpty()) {
153            pvcApi.create(pvcDef);
154        } else {
155            // spec is immutable, so mix in existing spec
156            GsonPtr.to(pvcDef.getRaw()).set("spec", GsonPtr
157                .to(existing.get().getRaw()).get(JsonObject.class, "spec")
158                .get().deepCopy());
159            K8s.apply(pvcApi, existing.get(),
160                channel.client().getJSON().serialize(pvcDef));
161        }
162    }
163
164    private void reconcileDisks(DynamicKubernetesObject vmDef,
165            WatchChannel channel) throws ApiException {
166        var disks = GsonPtr.to(vmDef.getRaw())
167            .get(JsonArray.class, "spec", "vm", "disks")
168            .map(JsonArray::asList).orElse(Collections.emptyList());
169        int index = 0;
170        for (var disk : disks) {
171            reconcileDisk(vmDef, index++, (JsonObject) disk, channel);
172        }
173    }
174
175    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals", "PMD.ConfusingTernary" })
176    private void reconcileDisk(DynamicKubernetesObject vmDefinition,
177            int index, JsonObject diskDef, WatchChannel channel)
178            throws ApiException {
179        var pvcObject = new DynamicKubernetesObject();
180        var pvcRaw = GsonPtr.to(pvcObject.getRaw());
181        var vmRaw = GsonPtr.to(vmDefinition.getRaw());
182        var pvcTpl = GsonPtr.to(diskDef).to("volumeClaimTemplate");
183
184        // Copy base and metadata from template and add missing/additional data.
185        pvcObject.setApiVersion(pvcTpl.getAsString("apiVersion").get());
186        pvcObject.setKind(pvcTpl.getAsString("kind").get());
187        var vmName = vmRaw.getAsString("metadata", "name").orElse("default");
188        pvcRaw.get(JsonObject.class).add("metadata",
189            pvcTpl.to("metadata").get(JsonObject.class).deepCopy());
190        var defMeta = pvcRaw.to("metadata");
191        defMeta.computeIfAbsent("namespace", () -> new JsonPrimitive(
192            vmRaw.getAsString("metadata", "namespace").orElse("default")));
193        defMeta.computeIfAbsent("name", () -> new JsonPrimitive(
194            vmName + "-disk-" + index));
195        var pvcLbls = pvcRaw.to("metadata", "labels");
196        pvcLbls.set("app.kubernetes.io/name", APP_NAME);
197        pvcLbls.set("app.kubernetes.io/instance", vmName);
198        pvcLbls.set("app.kubernetes.io/component", "disk");
199        pvcLbls.set("app.kubernetes.io/managed-by", VM_OP_NAME);
200
201        // Get API and check if PVC exists
202        DynamicKubernetesApi pvcApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi("", "v1",
203            "persistentvolumeclaims", channel.client());
204        var existing = K8s.get(pvcApi, pvcObject.getMetadata());
205
206        // If PVC does not exist, create. Else patch (apply)
207        if (existing.isEmpty()) {
208            // PVC does not exist yet, copy spec from template
209            pvcRaw.get(JsonObject.class).add("spec",
210                pvcTpl.to("spec").get(JsonObject.class).deepCopy());
211            pvcApi.create(pvcObject);
212        } else {
213            // spec is immutable, so mix in existing spec
214            pvcRaw.set("spec", GsonPtr.to(existing.get().getRaw())
215                .to("spec").get().deepCopy());
216            K8s.apply(pvcApi, existing.get(),
217                channel.client().getJSON().serialize(pvcObject));
218        }
219    }
220
221    private void deletePvcs(VmDefChanged event, WatchChannel channel)
222            throws ApiException {
223        // Get API and check and list related
224        var pvcApi = K8s.pvcApi(channel.client());
225        var pvcs = pvcApi.list(event.metadata().getNamespace(),
226            new ListOptions().labelSelector(
227                "app.kubernetes.io/managed-by=" + VM_OP_NAME
228                    + ",app.kubernetes.io/name=" + APP_NAME
229                    + ",app.kubernetes.io/instance="
230                    + event.metadata().getName()));
231        for (var pvc : pvcs.getObject().getItems()) {
232            K8s.delete(pvcApi, pvc);
233        }
234    }
235
236    private DynamicKubernetesObject reconcileConfigMap(VmDefChanged event,
237            Map<String, Object> model, WatchChannel channel)
238            throws IOException, TemplateException, ApiException {
239        // Get API and check if exists
240        DynamicKubernetesApi cmApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi("", "v1",
241            "configmaps", channel.client());
242        var existing = K8s.get(cmApi, event.metadata());
243
244        // If deleted, delete
245        if (event.type() == Type.DELETED) {
246            if (existing.isPresent()) {
247                K8s.delete(cmApi, existing.get());
248            }
249            return null;
250        }
251
252        // Combine template and data and parse result
253        var fmTemplate = fmConfig.getTemplate("runnerConfig.ftl.yaml");
254        StringWriter out = new StringWriter();
255        fmTemplate.process(model, out);
256        // Avoid Yaml.load due to
257        // https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/issues/2741
258        var mapDef = Dynamics.newFromYaml(out.toString());
259
260        // Apply
261        return K8s.apply(cmApi, mapDef, out.toString());
262    }
263
264    private void reconcilePod(VmDefChanged event, Map<String, Object> model,
265            WatchChannel channel)
266            throws IOException, TemplateException, ApiException {
267        // Check if exists
268        DynamicKubernetesApi podApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi("", "v1",
269            "pods", channel.client());
270        var existing = K8s.get(podApi, event.metadata());
271
272        // Get state
273        var state = GsonPtr.to((JsonObject) model.get("cr")).to("spec", "vm")
274            .getAsString("state").get();
275
276        // If deleted or stopped, delete
277        if (event.type() == Type.DELETED || STATE_STOPPED.equals(state)) {
278            if (existing.isPresent()) {
279                K8s.delete(podApi, existing.get());
280            }
281            return;
282        }
283
284        // Combine template and data and parse result
285        var fmTemplate = fmConfig.getTemplate("runnerPod.ftl.yaml");
286        StringWriter out = new StringWriter();
287        fmTemplate.process(model, out);
288        // Avoid Yaml.load due to
289        // https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/issues/2741
290        var podDef = Dynamics.newFromYaml(out.toString());
291
292        // Check if update
293        if (existing.isEmpty()) {
294            podApi.create(podDef);
295        } else {
296            // only annotations are updated
297            var metadata = new JsonObject();
298            metadata.add("annotations", GsonPtr.to(podDef.getRaw())
299                .to("metadata").get(JsonObject.class, "annotations").get());
300            var patch = new JsonObject();
301            patch.add("metadata", metadata);
302            podApi.patch(existing.get().getMetadata().getNamespace(),
303                existing.get().getMetadata().getName(),
304                V1Patch.PATCH_FORMAT_JSON_MERGE_PATCH,
305                new V1Patch(channel.client().getJSON().serialize(patch)))
306                .throwsApiException();
307        }
308    }
309
310}
